title: Specification of MiniDemographicABM.jl: A simplified agent-based demographic model of the UK. (arXiv:2307.16548v2 [cs.CL] UPDATED)
abstract: This documentation specifies a simplified non-calibrated demographic agent-based model of the UK, a largely simplified version of the Lone Parent Model presented in [Gostolil and Silverman 2020]. In the presented model, individuals of an initial population are subject to ageing, deaths, births, divorces and marriages throughout a simplified map of towns of the UK. The specification employs the formal terminology presented in [Elsheikh 2023a]. The main purpose of the model is to explore and exploit capabilities of the state-of-the-art Agents.jl Julia package [Datseris2022] in the context of demographic modeling applications. Implementation is provided via the Julia package MiniDemographicABM.jl [Elsheikh 2023b]. A specific simulation is progressed with a user-defined simulation fixed step size on a hourly, daily, weekly, monthly basis or even an arbitrary user-defined clock rate. The model can serve for comparative studies if implemented in other agent-based modelling frameworks and pro

translated_title: MiniDemographicABM.jl规范: 一个简化的基于代理的英国人口模型
translated_abstract: 本文详细介绍了一个简化的非校准的基于代理的英国人口模型，该模型是[Gostolil和Silverman 2020]中Lone Parent Model的大幅简化版本。在该模型中，初始人口中的个体经历了老化、死亡、生育、离婚和结婚等过程，模型使用了[Elsheikh 2023a]中介绍的形式术语。该模型的主要目的是探索和利用最先进的Agents.jl Julia包在人口模拟应用中的能力。具体实现通过Julia包MiniDemographicABM.jl[Elsheikh 2023b]提供。可以根据用户定义的模拟固定步长按小时、天、周、月甚至任意用户定义的时钟速率进行特定的模拟。该模型可用于在其他基于代理的建模框架中进行比较研究，进一步解释...
tldr: 本文介绍了一个简化的基于代理的英国人口模型MiniDemographicABM.jl，以探索和利用Agents.jl在人口建模应用中的能力。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a simplified agent-based demographic model of the UK, called MiniDemographicABM.jl, to explore and exploit the capabilities of Agents.jl in demographic modeling applications.
